content.text: Match ends, Tottenham Hotspur 1, Juventus 2.
Second Half ends, Tottenham Hotspur 1, Juventus 2.
Foul by Davinson Sánchez (Tottenham Hotspur).
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Douglas Costa.
